# Newcastle PCYC Table Tennis Club

> Newcastle's friendliest table tennis club at PCYC Broadmeadow, NSW 2292. Social and competitive table tennis for all ages and skill levels. Sessions Monday, Wednesday, and Saturday. First session free, no booking required.

## Club Information
- [Weekly Timetable](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/timetable): Session times — Monday 6:30-10pm, Wednesday 6:30-10pm, Saturday 2:30-6pm. No booking required.
- [What to Expect](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/expect): First-time visitor guide. What to wear, what to bring, how sessions work. Equipment provided free.
- [Pricing](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/pricing): First session free. $8.50 seniors, $9.50 adults per visit. $40 annual membership, $20 juniors.
- [Location & Contact](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/location): Young Road, Broadmeadow NSW 2292. Inside PCYC Newcastle. Entry instructions, parking info, contact form.
- [Competitions](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/competitions): Monday and Wednesday night graded competitions. All skill levels welcome.
- [About Us](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/about): Operating since 1996 at PCYC Newcastle. Community-focused club with members from 20s to 80s.

## Areas We Serve
- [Areas We Serve](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/areas): Newcastle, Broadmeadow, Hamilton, Lambton, Wallsend, Charlestown, Maitland, Lake Macquarie, Hunter Valley.

## Guides
- [Things to Do in Newcastle NSW](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/things-to-do-newcastle): Comprehensive guide to outdoor activities, indoor activities, food, arts, and sports in Newcastle.
- [Social Clubs in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/social-clubs-newcastle): Guide to sporting clubs, hobby groups, and community organisations in Newcastle NSW.
- [Evening Activities in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/evening-activities-newcastle): Day-by-day guide to weeknight activities including table tennis, trivia, live music, and dining.
- [Weekend Activities in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/weekend-activities-newcastle): Saturday and Sunday activity guide — parkrun, markets, table tennis, bushwalks, brunch.
- [Hobbies in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/hobbies-newcastle): Active, creative, and social hobbies you can pick up in Newcastle.
- [How to Make Friends in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/make-friends-newcastle): Evidence-based guide to making friends as an adult through regular social activities.
- [Indoor Activities in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/indoor-activities-newcastle): Weather-proof indoor activities including table tennis, bowling, cinema, and more.
- [Rainy Day Activities in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/rainy-day-activities-newcastle): What to do when it rains in Newcastle — indoor sports, museums, galleries, escape rooms.
- [Activities for Seniors in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/seniors-activities-newcastle): Low-impact, social activities for older adults — table tennis, walking, swimming, lawn bowls.
- [Gym Alternatives in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/gym-alternatives-newcastle): Affordable alternatives to gym memberships with cost comparison table.
- [Low-Impact Sports in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/low-impact-sports-newcastle): Gentle exercise options for people with joint issues, injuries, or chronic conditions.
- [Sports Clubs in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/sports-clubs-newcastle): Directory of team sports, racquet sports, individual sports, and social sports clubs.
- [Racquet Sports in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/racquet-sports-newcastle): Comparison of tennis, table tennis, badminton, and squash — cost, venues, fitness level.
- [School Holiday Activities in Newcastle](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/school-holiday-activities-newcastle): Family-friendly activities for kids during school holidays.
- [Things to Do in Lake Macquarie](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/things-to-do-lake-macquarie): Lake activities, bushwalks, parks, and nearby sports including table tennis.
- [Table Tennis Near Maitland](https://www.newcastletabletennis.com.au/guides/table-tennis-near-maitland): Closest dedicated table tennis club to Maitland — PCYC Broadmeadow, 25 minutes drive.

## Contact
- Email: newcastletabletennis@gmail.com
- Phone: (02) 4961 4493
- Address: Young Road, Broadmeadow NSW 2292 (inside PCYC Newcastle)
